title: Node down Ubuntu 20.04
body:
since 3 hours my node has stopped working.

Latest Prysm version is v1.3.11.
geth VERSION:
   1.10.4-stable-aa637fd3

prysm.sh[2165]: time="2021-07-07 11:17:49" level=warning msg="Could not determine if beacon chain started: could not setup beacon chain ChainStart streaming client: rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = connection error: desc = "transport: Error while dialing dial tcp 127.0.0.1:4000: connect: connection refused": could not connect" prefix=validator

same problem, can someone help pls?
@Piradoxlanieve @BoxKei this would mean your beacon node is down, can you check why it is down ?

Sorry my bad english.
@Piradoxlanieve yes! #9068 will solve your issue in the next release. @nisdas may have a temporary solution for you in the meantime.
@Piradoxlanieve Can you restart your beacon node/validator and run again ? it should have things running till our next release.

@nisdas
it restarted but it continues not working, does it mean that we have to wait for the new version to be able to have the node active? Any approximate date for the launch? thanks for your help and work.
